name: Importar Blog

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: "0 3 * * *"
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Setup Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: "3.10"

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: pip install requests beautifulsoup4 pyyaml unidecode

      - name: Import blog content
        run: python scripts/importar_blog.py

      - name: Commit changes
        run: |
          git config --global user.name "GitHub Actions"
          git config --global user.email "actions@github.com"
          git add .
          git commit -m "Atualização automática" || echo "Sem alterações"

      - name: Push changes
        uses: ad-m/github-push-action@v0.6.0
        with:
          github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
